feed.title: Dev Progress
feed.subtitle: My insights as a developer. Be it about random or technical insights.

entry.title: The start of this blog
entry.content:
I’ve always liked the idea of writing down insights, sharing them with others and hearing feedback. That’s the best way for me to improve.

Expect random posts about code quality, Swift or working with the Godot Engine.
entry.summary: I’ve always liked the idea of writing down insights, sharing them with others and hearing feedback. That’s the best way for me to improve.
